Rishabh Pant's cryptic Instagram post vi.content: Delhi captain Rishabh Pant came up with a cryptic Instagram post, a day after he was handed a one-match ban for maintaining slow over-rate during an IPL 2024 match on Tuesday.Pant was initially fined Rs 12 lakh and then Rs 24 lakh for the first two over-rate offences and was handed a ban for the third one." Pant became the first captain to be banned for an over-rate offence in IPL 2024.Notably, stand-in captain Axar Patel revealed that Risabh Pant was angry with the ban after he learnt about it in the hotel room on the eve of their match in Bengaluru.Pant did not take the field during their must-win game against RCB in Bengaluru on Sunday, May 12.

Why Real Madrid did not receive La Liga.content: (@realmadrid) May 12, 2024After receiving the title in the presence of Real Madrid President, Florentino Perez, the squad celebrated the triumph with their massive fanbase with an open-top bus parade through the streets of Madrid.Real Madrid received their 36th La Liga trophy at their training ground in the club's Valdebebas training ground on May 12, and not after the emphatic 4-0 victory over Granada on the previous day at the Los Cármene stadium.Real Madrid currently stand at 90 points in their 35 matches, which is already their second-highest points tally, only behind their 100-points finish under Jose Mourinho in 2011-12 season.Following their usual title-winning routine, the full Real Madrid side travelled to the regional government headquarters at Puerta del Sol, and then to the Cibeles in front of a massive crowd of fans, popularly known as 'Madridistas'.(@realmadrid) May 12, 2024Real Madrid will be heading to Wembley for their highly anticipated UCL Final against Borussia Dortmund on June 2, where the Los Blancos will fight for a record-extending 15th title.

After shock exit, Novak Djokovic reveals.content:
After getting hit on the head with a bottle yesterday, Novak Djokovic arrives to the tournament in Rome wearing a helmet ðŸ˜‚

Leave it up to Novak to turn this into comedic gold.Novak Djokovic was asked if getting hit on the head with the bottle impacted his tennis today after his loss to Tabilo

“Was this related at all to the bottle incident?Novak Djokovic reckoned that the bottle incident might have played a role in his shock exit from the Italian Open 2024.Expectations will be high from Djokovic in the upcoming French Open as he is the defending champion at Roland Garros.Djokovic recently pulled out of the Madrid Open and he did not have the best of times in Rome as well.

IPL 2024: MS Dhoni's bromance with Sures.content:
Former India and CSK all-rounder, Suresh Raina joined MS Dhoni and the rest of the Super Kings teammates as they went on a lap of honour at the MA Chidambaram Stadium after their final home game of IPL 2024 on Sunday, May 12.CSK fans turned out in large numbers with some giant banners and posted, flaunting their love for the Super Kings and MS Dhoni.MS Dhoni and Suresh Raina then shared a warm embrace as the Super Kings fans went on a nostalgia trip, seeing their 'Thala' and 'Chinna Thala' back together at their 'Anbuden'.com/QWuPq6c3yt
— JioCinema (@JioCinema) May 12, 2024Ruturaj Gaikwad and MS Dhoni were also seen posing with the members of the groundstaff at the MA Chidambaram Stadium.Notably, the Super Kings had informed fans via social media to stay back after the end of the match for a 'special event'.

Novak Djokovic suffers shock exit from I.content: Chile's Alejandro Tabilo claimed the biggest win of his career when he beat world number one Novak Djokovic 6-2 6-3 in the third round of the Italian Open in a match that lasted just 67 minutes on Sunday, two days after the Serbian was hit on the head by a water bottle."The victory made the 26-year-old Tabilo -- who won a Challenger Tour tournament two weeks ago -- the first Chilean in 17 years to beat a world number one since Fernando Gonzalez beat Roger Federer at the ATP Finals in 2007."The result also means Djokovic -- who made a double fault on match point -- has failed to reach a single final in 2024 and has played only six matches on clay in the build-up to the French Open.Djokovic looked far from his best and the 36-year-old blamed Friday's "unfortunate" incident where he was accidentally struck on the head by a fan's water bottle while signing autographs after his second-round win.Djokovic has won the tournament six times, with his last title coming in 2022, but Tabilo broke the top seed four times on Centre Court while not conceding a single break point.

RCB vs DC: Ishant Sharma gives ‘friendly.content:
com/dAvo03LbmI
— JioCinema (@JioCinema) May 12, 2024Both Ishant and Kohli made sure they did not cross the line and it was all smiles between the two players, who began their first-class careers together at Delhi.Ishant was on the receiving end when he was smashed for a four and a six in the first two deliveries of the fourth over.Virat Kohli and Ishant Sharma were engaged in banter during RCB's home game against Delhi in Bengaluru on Sunday, May 12.In fact, it was Virat Kohli who started the banter when he had a word with Ishant Sharma after an outside edge flew to the third man boundary in the first delivery.In the very next delivery, Ishant got the big wicket of Kohli with a wide delivery that swung away a bit after pitching.

Sanju Samson's message to RR after 3rd s.content: Hence after the powerplay the score we were expecting was 170, we were short 20-25 runs.CSK vs RR, IPL 2024 Highlights | ScorecardSamson said that they were expecting a score of 170 after their powerplay but ultimately fell short.

42 off 41: Ruturaj Gaikwad happy with an.content: Ruturaj Gaikwad said that his job was to bat until the very end during CSK’s IPL 2024 match against RR on Sunday, May 12 at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai.Gaikwad said that having stroke-makers in the Chennai line-up makes life easier for him and allows him to play through the innings.CSK vs RR, IPL 2024 Highlights | ScorecardIn the end, Sameer Rizvi played a brief cameo of 15 off 8 balls to take CSK past the finish line.IPL 2024 Full Coverage | IPL 2024 Points Table and Standings | 2024 IPL Full ScheduleRuturaj, who made his IPL debut back in 2020, also said that the Super Kings thrive on pitches, which offer help to the spinners.Gaikwad scored an unbeaten 42 off 41 balls with a four and 2 sixes as the Super Kings won by 5 wickets after chasing down a target of 142 with 10 deliveries left in their innings.

RCB vs DC: Rishabh Pant was angry with o.content: Stand-in captain Axar Patel revealed Rishabh Pant was angry after he learned about his one-match ban due to an over-rate offence.Axar added that Pant even appealed against the ban after the wicketkeeper-batter was handed a one-match suspension for the team's 3rd over-rate offence in IPL 2024.Notably, Rishabh Pant was penalised after Delhi maintained slow over-rate during their win over Rajasthan at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi on May 7.Pant was penalised by the Board of Control for Cricket in India after the third instance of Delhi staying behind the required over-rate in an IPL match.Pant became the first captain to be banned for over-rate offence in the ongoing season.

RCB vs DC: Kumar Kushagra replaces Risha.content: DC made 2 changes in their playing XI ahead of their IPL 2024 match against home team RCB on Sunday, May 12 at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.The Capitals are placed fifth in the table with 12 points and a net run rate of -0.They are placed seventh in the table with 10 points and a net run rate of +0.19-year-old Kumar Kushagra has replaced Rishabh Pant, who was banned from the game due to a slow over rate in the match against RR at the Arun Jaitley Stadium.IPL 2024 Full Coverage | IPL 2024 Points Table and Standings | 2024 IPL Full ScheduleRCB, on the other hand, did not make any change to their playing XI.
